content: In Greek mythology, what hero had to complete 12 seemingly impossible tasks as penance for his actions?

The hero you're referring to is Heracles, also known as Hercules in Roman mythology. He was tasked with completing 12 labors as a form of penance for a crime he committed in a fit of madness. These tasks were known as the Twelve Labors of Heracles and are among the most famous episodes in Greek mythology.
